193 [[watt]]s night | erp = | haat = | class = B | facility_id = 36158 | coordinates = {{coord|34|7|15.00|N|83|58|35.00|W|region:US-GA_type:landmark}} | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = | owner = La Favorita, Inc. | licensee = | sister_stations = | webcast = | website = [http://www.radiolafavorita.com radiolafavorita.com] | affiliations = }} '''WXEM''' (1460 [[AM broadcasting|AM]]) is a [[radio station]] broadcasting a [[Regional Mexican]] format. Licensed to [[Buford, Georgia]], USA, it serves the Atlanta area. The station is currently owned by La Favorita, Inc.. ==External links== *{{AMQ|WXEM}} *{{AML|WXEM}} *{{AMARB|WXEM}}
